name: Bizcasts.com
overview:
Bizcasts matches employers and job seekers.

The Bizcasts website enables employers to enter specific criteria regarding the jobs they are seeking to fill. Job seekers in turn can upload video resumes in order to market, promote and advertise themselves. Bizcasts matching technology matches employers with job seekers by sending employers the profile of the job seekers that best fits the job criteria they entered.

From here the Employer can conduct a “Speed Interview” by sending a list of questions for the job seekers to answer. Job Seekers can use multimedia communication to respond to the employers speed interview. To use an analogy to â€œspeed dating,â€ Bizcasts allows employers to interact with a number of individuals in a relatively short period of time, and establish whether there might be a good “match” between the candidateâ€™s background and objectives, and the needs of the company.

Bizcasts, getting America back to work.
